projects.description: The Random Quote Generator is a simple quote generator that randomly chooses a quote from a list, along with various other information about the quote(who said it, what movie, year, etc.)

In this project, we had to take a list of various lengths, and divide it into pages of 10 people, and include the links to other pages.  Also, we set up a search box to search all names within the list.

I was tasked with taking a static form and adding functionality to it using Javascript.  Using event handlers, regular expressions, and form validation, I was able to add interactivity and functionality to the form

This project involved using object-oriented javascript to create Phrase Hunter, a 'hangman'-like game.  A random phrase was chosen from a list, the board was set up, and functionality was added to all buttons.  Through event handlers, I was able to change the state of various objects, to further the gameplay.  The score is kept, and after 5 missed letters, the game is over.

This application was set up to send out an API request to a generic API, and to retrieve a list of 'employees', who were then displayed on the screen.  If you click on an employee, it shows a module with more information about this employee.  Search is also included, the sort through the 12 employees.
